text: Shoeshine may refer to: *Shoeshine (film) (Sciuscià), a 1946 film directed by Vittorio De Sica *Shoe polish *Shoeshiner *Shoeshine Boy, the alter ego of the starring character in the animated TV series, Underdog *In boxing, shoeshining is the term often given to a rapid series of uppercuts *"Shoeshine", an episode of the television series Teletubbies ==See also== * Shoe (disambiguation) * Shine (disambiguation)
title: Shoeshine
